CustomField.formula: IF(ISPICKVAL(Account_Rating__c, "5"), IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=01561000001ktSB", "high",15,75), IF(ISPICKVAL(Account_Rating__c, "4"), IMAGE ("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=01561000001ktS6", "high",18,60), IF(ISPICKVAL(Account_Rating__c, "3"), IMAGE ("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=01561000001ktS1", "high",18,45), IF(ISPICKVAL(Account_Rating__c, "2"), IMAGE ("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=01561000001ktRw", "high",15,30), IF(ISPICKVAL(Account_Rating__c, "1"), IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=01561000001ktRr", "high",15,15),null)))))
CustomField.label: Rating
